website_summaries.verdict: The GE X500 megazoom is a very good value as long as you understand its photo and performance limitations.
pros: The GE Power Pro X500 offers a lot for its low price including a 15x wide-angle zoom lens and semimanual and manual controls
cons: The X500's shooting performance is really slow and it's not good indoors without a flash and in low-light conditions

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious!  The video sound is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work out for me. I bought it for ALL the wonderful features!!! It's hard to find one with an actual lens to view rather than just the whole back of the camera. Especially at this price!!!! However, as others said, the sound is too low for video recording and the camera is noisy. I really wish it had worked for me. It had a great zoom lens. So many wonderful features!!!!! Now, I have a camera bag & rechargeable batteries that I don't need. I had high hopes that were dashed and I returned the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Samigirl

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to use, lots of features
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight camera that takes great photos without having to lug around extra lenses and equipment. More options to take photos than traditional point-and-shoot digital cameras. Download the manual and read how to use everything to get the most out of it. I practiced for a while at home before taking it to Alaska. I especially like that you can switch from the digital screen to a more traditional viewfinder because it's hard to see the screen in bight sunlight. The digital telephoto is also great, zooms in much closer than most small point-and-shoot cameras. Also a good idea to get rechargeable batteries and a charger so you'll always have batteries ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl M

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this product exceeded all my expectations with regard to a digital camera. I have only ever used an analog 35mm camera. This was my first experience with a digital camera device. The photo quality was every bit as good as what I am used to with 35mm camera, if not better. The zoom lens feature is out of this world. I could not have been happier with the crystal clear photos using the zoom feature. I have posted examples of these photos on my Facebook page if anyone would like to view them: Jim DeWilde/ Lapeer, MI, Yellowstone 2012, final edit. Again, I cannot say enough about the excellent quality of this digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jim DeWilde

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a great buy. I particularly like how easy it is to hold, point, and shoot your picture. It is not like all the mini cameras that I find difficult to hold onto. The GE camera has a grip that fits my hand perfectly. The button to shoot the picture is at the end of the grip right where your finger is. The lens is very very good, and I am amazed at the quality of the digital picture. It has great color and real depth. It is an extremely easy camera to use. I love it. I didn't even know that GE made cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kay

customer_reviews.title: screwed up focus
customer_reviews.text: worked great for the first couple months. got back to using it to find that the focus is locked and every thing is fuzzy. i can get it working but i have to bang the camera against my palm til i hear a click and the focus works again. but this happens every time i turn the damn thing on. plus, my galaxy s3 has better imaging than this does. cant return it cuz its waaaay past return date. it came with batteries in it but they were all dead, so im 90% sure i got either a return item or a test item. not happy
customer_reviews.author: Rucifer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I kept it
customer_reviews.text: I was going to use this for my photography class but it turned out I needed a DSLR that can remove it's lens so I had to return. But from when I did use it, it was so fun! I haven't had a working camera for like a year and a half, I forgot how much I loved taking pictures. I played around with it as much as possible! I can't say I ran into problems nor can I say that it was THE BEST camera, but it was pretty decent. And I would totally resell my DSLR to have this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ly Hoang

customer_reviews.title: GE power pro x500-bk 16 mp
customer_reviews.text: This is the third digital camera I have purchased for my family to use, the first being a kodak 810 pixel nightmare, and the second a fujifilm 12 megapixel, which took great pictures, but was stolen. This replacement is more than adequate to my present needs, at a great price. It takes good photos indoors and out on the automatic settings if you wait long enough for the sensor to analyze and set up the shot you selected. I'm sure as I get more familiar with the camera I'll like it even more. So far, I think I made a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RMGII

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my my thirteen year old sister who recently took up an interst i photography. I refused to buy her the 700$ dslr she originally asked for but this turned out to be the perfect starter camera for her. Small and compact with good picture quality. Only 4 starts because it's battery powered.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Professional pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my son last year for Christmas. He wanted something he could take with him on his railroad inspection job. He is very happy with it. It takes really nice pictures of landscape, animals and people. He took some pictures of my granddaughter sitting in a field that looks absolutely professional. I was a little unsure whether to buy it or not since it wasn't the typical camera name brands. However, I am glad I did the quality of the camera and the pictures are awesome! Great camera at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GE Power Pro Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. It takes perfect pictures. Even if your hand is a bit shakey, the picture is perfectly sharp. I used Energizer batteries in the camera and they lasted well. The only problem I've encountered is that the battery compartment door is a bit hard to open and close. After a few uses, the hinge on mine broke. Maybe I wasn't careful enough with it. To get it replaced, the camera must be mailed to GE in California for replacement. The charge is $30. Otherwise, this is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P

customer_reviews.title: digital Cameras
customer_reviews.text: You can buy almost any camera with big buks attached to it. But this little camera has just about all the functions you ever really need in a nice priced camera. There are still a few functions that I have not fully mastered with this camera, but at this point in the game I am totally satisfied with this camera and I would recommend it to the better than average picture person. As it is with most multifunction cameras one has to learn how to use all the bells and whistles. I say folks for the money and at 16 mp you just can't beat it. KW
customer_reviews.author: Woods Writer

customer_reviews.title: GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for a beginner like me. Easy to use and easy to understand. It takes wonderful pictures and the price is great too! It has settings for tons of applications like nighttime, portrait, panorama, too much light, too little light, etc. The list goes on and on. The only thing I don't like is the manual which is on a disc to view on your computer etc. I like paper manual books personally. So I found myself printing out the pages I needed to study better. Overall though a fantastic camera!
customer_reviews.author: Debra McTaggert

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I must say that this camera has not been all that I had hoped it to be. The pictures have not had near the quality to them as I had hoped; plus I have had a lot of issues with the zoom lens not going back to the normal setting when I turn the knob thing for it. I end up shutting the camera off and back on in order to get it back to the normal view a lot of times. It has been quite a pain and disappointment. Considering that is was not a extremely high priced camera, I guess I shouldn't complain, but I really had expected better quality from it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hiller

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Most appealing thing about this camera was the price...we were looking for an inexpensive option that would allow some decent zoom...seems to be kind of hit and miss with it's abilities...sometimes it will auto focus well, sometimes not...even when you are basically taking the same picture you did right before...and the opening and closing of the flash is annoying...seems like they could have just placed it on the front in the open position to allow for easier operation
customer_reviews.author: orlandodawg

customer_reviews.title: OK product for the price
customer_reviews.text: OK product for the price. Needed an inexpensive camera with the options this unit has for a college photography course my daughter had to take for her major. She was not particularly interested in photography so I did not want to spend a fortune for a camera she likely would not use after the class. Worked well for her and the situation for which it was purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for a teen present. Didn't come with manual though or may have gotten another star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new GE Pro 500 digital camera from Amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: I'm still making friends with my new GE camera, but so far it has performed admirably. I am taking a photography class and still learning how to use the "manual" settings for more artistic control but the auto ones I have taken look great! I am happy that I purchased the GE Pro 500 camera. It was one of three recommended by my teacher as a good "starting" cameras.I had checked the usual sources available to me (Radio Shack, Walmart etc) looking for the best prices and Amazon.com not only beat their prices but blew them away even after shipping was included! It arrived in 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: mimik

customer_reviews.title: GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP, 15 x Optical Zoom
customer_reviews.text: After a little more than a month of use, this is the best camera that I have owned. Great stills and great motion pictures (with sound) from one camera are wonderful. The zoom will allow me to reach out and get a good picture without physically being that close. The use of 4 AA batteries is very economical as far as getting many pictures & replacing the batteries. There are many photographic options available on the camera, but it is easy to operate once you familiarize yourself with the control knob & menu selections.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Halbert

customer_reviews.title: O i love this cramer i use it to do a coworker ...
customer_reviews.text: O i love this cramer i use it to do a coworker wedding on 8-27-16 and i did video to her pictures 📷 came out beautiful and the video came out good. Love it:)
customer_reviews.author: NeNe Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Is it realy that hard?
customer_reviews.text: We have tried to get a good , yet inexpensive Camera for the last year. No luck. After reading the reviews here I took a chance. This is a really decent unit at a low price. Is it really that hard for camera makers to do what GE has done? GE, when my wife heard the name she was concerned that the camera would not be any good. They have well exceeded the " Big name" camera guys by leaps and bounds. All for a "It fell of the truck" Price. Well done GE, well done.
customer_reviews.author: Kenyatta

customer_reviews.title: to lazy to learn this camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a solid review based on other reviews i got this camera. Its a good camera the display is not that great. But i was told the pic looks really good after you plug the camera to the computer or you print them. (since I am notorious for keeping pics on my camera for ever without doing anything to them) I have done neither. I used the camera a for a week while on vacation and have not used it since it did the job,but i will have to one day really learn the in and outs of what seems like it can be a really good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kahdine

customer_reviews.title: A good camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: This camera has all the bells and whistles I wanted. Viewfinder, 16MP, great optical/digital zoom, panorama with easy stitch, video all kinds of modes and options. A wonderful starter digital camera. But I was disappointed with the photographic results. It just does not produce the kind of picture I expect from a 16MP camera. For me, in the end its all about the bang of the picture. I want a bright, sharp, crisp photo. This camera just didn't do it for me. But for the money, it cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.author: ShawnF

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera off of Amazon as an upgrade from the little box cameras we have used for so long. The camera is small but powerful; and by using the "Scene" mode it's very easy to use. I have some awesome pictures of the full digital zoom and panorama capabilities. I would recommend this camera to anyone interested in stepping up to the next level in digital photography without having to read a manual.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Present for Capturing Family Moments
customer_reviews.text: My brother, 35 years old, wanted a nice camera for his birthday since the last one he had was only a 5mp camera. This one is great. He has only had it for 2 weeks so there is a lot more to learn how to use. However, he loves it. Detailed picture and great price. Very sturdy and looks very expensive. He loves it and has not stopped taking pictures. I would recommend this camera. I am thinking of getting one for my family because I love to scrapbook.
customer_reviews.author: Quito24

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Shutter Lag
customer_reviews.text: While this camera will take great pictures and the zoom is a super nice feature, there is such a shutter lag, I was often missing shots I wanted. After owning a year, I replaced this with a step up Panasonic camera. There is so much to like about this camera for the casual user who wants to be a step up from a standard point and shoot. I just couldn't live with the shutter lag.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGal

customer_reviews.title: not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional photographer.I really like this camera.The zoom is amazing ! it's a little big but I guess they were going for the pro camera look. If you take pictures right after another they are blurry and or the camera pauses or gets kind of frozen.The video picture is excellent but the sound stink's you cant hear anything but Muffled noise.The picture quality is fine. I'm happy enough with the camera and the price is what really sold me.
customer_reviews.author: sewbiz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing camera
customer_reviews.text: I considered buying the Nikon that same day and regret not choosing it over this GE. There is a problem with the auto focus. By the time you take the picture after the auto focus zooms in and out the subject is changed. When using it for still photos, the photo always comes out blurry no matter how you try to adjust the settings. The settings are burdensome to adjust in most settings. The only good photos are taken in daylight or outside. I cannot recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Dawson

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for then some!
customer_reviews.text: GREETINGS...LOT'S OT TIME SPENT LOOKING,EVERY MODEL FROM $100 TO $400,ALL THE BRANDS...THEN THIS ONE CAME ALONG,BARGAINED PRICED,FULL OF USEFUL FEATURES AND DELIVERED IN 7 DAYS TO AUSTRALIA.UNPACKED TO FEEL WHAT IT WAS ALL ABOUT AND IT DOES FEEL GOOD,LOOK'S GOOD IN THE FLESH AND A DECENT WEIGHT...IT WAS NEEDED FOR A REASONABLE ZOOM LENGTH ALONG WITH CLEAR PICTURES,GET TO UNDERSTAND THIS LITTLE GEM AND IT PRODUCES EXCELLENT 6X4'S...WHAT MORE COULD YOU WANT FOR THE BARGAIN BASEMENT PRICING...RONALD.C.LEE-HARRIS.
customer_reviews.author: anoldpackardkeeper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera- [Updated 5/16/16] I originally purchased; August 24, 2011 & this camera still goes everywhere w/ me takes pictures way better than your cell phone, although a little more bulky, it's worth the quality of the picture memories
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews, both good and bad. I wanted a cheap inexpensive camera with good zoom capacity. This camera has worked great. The zoom is amazing. I paid $119 and you can't touch it's zooming performance without jumping up in price. I've taken 100+ pictures and have had not one problem. I still haven't figured out all that this camera can do but it's relatively simple and fun to use. It's a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Eats up the batteries too fast!
customer_reviews.text: Can't keep power for any time at all. 4 batteries are needed and impossible to keep it supplied with them. Disappointed in this camera. Too expensive considering the power problem.
customer_reviews.author: kae

customer_reviews.title: GE Camera X 500
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this camera for over 2 months now, And after practicing with it in all the different modes. I find it is one of the best cameras I have ever owned. I can take crystal clear macro and zoom pictures. It takes wonderful panoramic pictures. I am still on the same batteries after 300 pictures, The smile and facial recognition is tremendous. For the price it is an excellent camera. It has image stabilization which works great. It has many options found on more expensive cameras. Db.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Byers

customer_reviews.title: Grat camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the photos this takes the only suggestion I'd make is to include a hard copy of instructions so you can keep with camera case to look up the different settings for special shots like nighttime and such.
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Sipple

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my wife for Christmas. Was more than surprised when looking at the images after capture. The zoom is a lot better than anticipated. With the 8gb card holds about 2k + pictures. I do believe it is a good product for the price. On a side note, I had to threaten to take the batteries and the card away from my wife the first 2 hours after giving it to her to stop her from taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: T. Poole

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The price for this camera in no way reflects the quality. This camera could be priced much higher and still be a bargin. I bought this camera to use in my classroom and it is handled by over 124 students daily. It has taken the beating of mixed experience users. It has stood up to the constant use and takes phenomenal pictures. This camera is feature rich, the battery life is longer than most cameras similar to this. I plan to buy a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Camera
customer_reviews.text: I take close-up pictures of my porcelain paintings during each phase of firing in addition to using the camera for studies of plants, animals and scenery. It is easy to use and does so many functions. I'm not a camera expert and this fits my needs exactly. I've learned to take panorama shots and to use the various functions without having to be a PH.D in photography. This is an excellent camera at an excellent price. I highly recommend this camera. BTW, I also bought the Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Picone

customer_reviews.title: Power pro LCD screen does not work
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing the GE camera I brought it with me overseas to take pictures while working on assignment for the next few months. When I first took my camera to use it I was surprised and disappointed to find that the LCD screen was not working. It does not show the picture you are going to take, and you can only see it on view finder. I have to return it but need to know how I can contact the supplier Electronic Deals since they provided an 800 number that I can not reach them and they did not supply an e mail contact with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: GE Poere Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 X Zoom
customer_reviews.text: This camera took me a while to learn it since I had a Sony Camera prior to this. Now, I love this little camera. Takes fantastic pictures, lightweight, easy to carry with you and always ready to go..(rechargeable batteries). I love the 15-X Zoom, and the color clarity is absolutely beautiful. What a great camera for the price. I paid twice as much for my Sony, and this camera does the exact same thing. Love, love, loveit. Jan B.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Not very good for long distance shots
customer_reviews.text: When I read the reviews on this camera I thought I had done enough research, but I did not. The camera is fine if you take shots in a lot of light and the objects are not moving at all. Other than that if you try and use the zoom the shots are grainy and if you are in a dim place again they are grainy. It could have gotten a much cheaper point and shot rather than this. I have to purchase another camera for my needs and this one does not do it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about this camera but after reading a lot of reviews I decided to give it a try. For the price it is a great camera. Everything works and the features are good and there are a lot of them especially for the price of the camera. Of course you can get better cameras, but for the price on this one you get your money's worth and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good quality camera without the huge price tag. I am a amateur when it comes to taking pictures but after taking it to a local photographer, I've become more comfortable using this camera. Plus I love the zoom capability on this baby! I can get shots of my little darling when she is performing on stage and I don't have to be "that" person walking down in front of everyone! Awesome! Couldn't be happier. Ecstatic about this purchase. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: GE camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased as a gift. The recipient is very pleased with it. It is easy to use, the pictures are of a great quality and best of all it has a view finder which most cameras in this price range do not. The AA batteries have not been a problem and have lasted a good period of time. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat of Louisiana

customer_reviews.title: not a bad little camera
customer_reviews.text: finaly got away from the film. This is a nice little camera, at the time of purchase we had grand kids number two and three on the way. With the cost of developing firm not getting a ny cheaper, I figured it was time for the digital move. The camera is easy enough to get figured out with lots of different settings, that at fiirst seemed like over kill. I would recemend a tri-pod for shot that have any distance.
customer_reviews.author: abatemember

customer_reviews.title: basic but long lasting digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I have years with this digital camera, it was the first digital camera in my life, and until today after almost 6 years, it still works and is in perfect condition, the image quality, resolution and focus are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson Otero

customer_reviews.title: Love my Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera and the pictures that it produce. What I hated was, after taking all the pictures and after installing the program on my computer to download the pictures. It took me for ever to figure out how to get the pictures to download only because the directions wasn't really clear - I went by the direction, but they didn't work. The directions didn't tell what you can do if following the directions failed - need more directions. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Shyone

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as an alternative to a mirror. Because I did not want to carry a huge camera and its lenses. And I do not regret my purchase. This camera is made durable, very good menu, compact and very easy to use. There are many modes and settings, very much what is in the manual mode, many cameras at this price it is not.This is certainly not DSLR, but not inferior to it as images. But there is one drawback. Its screen is not exactly conveys quality, on-screen image is always worse than it actually turns out the photo. But even so the camera is good. I recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Alex-poet

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have taken various types of photos with auto settings and manual setting changes. In my opinion this camera cannot be beat at this price. We have a Fujifilm Finepix SRL that was 3 times the cost and I would put them on the same performance level. I know GE is not known for cameras, but this one should put them on the map.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Good budget camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my wife's old camera, and to be honest, it was everything she wanted until I surprised her with a Canon Rebel. Image quality is good, and the manual controls make it easier to make those quick adjustments to get a picture just right. She wants to put it on eBay, and I just might keep it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: J. Rittmann

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera because I wanted tk take better photos of my children then a point and shoot. You can't beat the price. I also enjoy taking photos of nature and that is now my favorite part of thos camera. This camera is high quality, very easy to store and handle, and light. I still have no idea how to use all the functions but I am completely thrilled with my choice on getting this camera. My only issue would be it takes a moment to shoot and with young children I miss some good shots. I rate it 5 star and for the price and the quality it earns 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: jng1985

customer_reviews.title: Having fun learning to use this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to finally upgrade from my point-and-shoot, super old Sony Cybershot and this camera has been so much fun so far. It has some features of a point-and-shoot, but a lot of the features of a more sophisticated camera. I'm still learning how to best use the different settings, but so far it's well-worth the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Belle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing!! It takes great photos. Sometimes I feel a little too good. lol. It is worth the price if you want something better then the other smaller cameras. This one has so many settings you can choose. We always set the settings ourselves but you can let the camera do it automatically. Anyways, its a great camera so if you want and awesome camera get this one. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: A amazing camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got my wife this camera for Mother's Day. I had just dropped and broken her camera, so I felt the need to replace it. This camera has everything you could imagine or hope for in a camera. My wife is really enjoying it. It almost makes breaking her other camera a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Green

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift. Giftee very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my sister-in-law, who fancies herself an amateur photographer. She loves it, and has particularly mentioned favorably the depth of zoom. She even won 2nd place in a local nature photography contest, with a picture of a bird on a tree branch.
customer_reviews.author: GiantChickenOfDoom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. The quality of the pictures is amazing. I am an amateur photographer and this camera is easy to use. My husband is jealous because I now take better pictures than he does. I would recommend this camera for any novice user. I take my camera with me everywhere I go so I don't miss any cool shots.
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: The cost of this camera is well worth it. I bought this as a gift for my fiance. He took the camera out to take some shots of flowers and things within nature. uploading went well on to he PC , a few of the pics he took were blurry. Not sure if it was because of the wind was blowing or what. He is wondering how long it will hold out in the long run ... I guess we won't know that until it dies. I order one for myself since the price was so good.. When that comes in I will check it out for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dobielover4ever

customer_reviews.title: Best for the $
customer_reviews.text: This camera has all the bells and whistles of its more expensive counterparts and in some cases even takes better pics!LOL no but seriously, I have taken upwards of 1000 pics w this already and I have been booked for weddings and parties already...Im just an amateur photog but i guess the bug got me due to this lovely little cam! This think is DEF worth the money, esp if your thinking of buying junior his first cam or just getting one for vaca pics but not spending a ton of money! Def worth it!
customer_reviews.author: SydeShow

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Goes through batteries really fast though. Have taken some pictures that show up right after you snap the picture but then go back later and have a white screen. Not sure what that's a bout. Have had other digitalis that didn't do that. Good quality pictures
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B. Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible pictures
customer_reviews.text: This is the second point and shoot camera I have had. I had a Canon but dropped and damaged. I tried the GE, unfortunately, must return. The picture quality is awful. It is difficult to handle and it would take several tries to put the flash on auto. Hopefully, I will find something in this price range of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning to use this camera, but so far i love it as a starter camera. i haven't had any problems using the camera indoors...and with enough natural light, pictures come out very clear and beautiful. I am adding a picture i took of my daughter to show how great this camera is. Only complaint i have so far is the digital instruction manual. I wish they included a hard copy of it.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Maybe 5?
customer_reviews.text: So far, it is everything I could want. But I haven't had it long enough to fairly rate it. I only held back from awarding it 5 because I may still find some feature that is not perfect - such as short battery life or flash failure - but as it stands right now, I think it gets a 5.
customer_reviews.author: curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: It's great when it actually focuses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera for taking picks while working on mechanical projects. Photos can show how items go back together when the mind does not remember. This camera just what I was looking for EXCEPT it can't focus about 1/2 the time. It's the most horribly frustrating camera I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: 4estGimp

customer_reviews.title: It was a great step-up camera as she advanced her interest in photography ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our granddaughter - it turns out very professional pictures. It was a great step-up camera as she advanced her interest in photography and she still uses it constantly for various projects.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Houseknecht

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is exactly what I was looking for. I ride my horse in the mountains and wanted a camera better than my Panasonic and sony. This is the one. The stabilization is great. Pictures are clear. Video is excellent quality. Especially while trotting down a trail. The features are great with easy to understand instructions. Highly recommend this camera for those who want quality without spending alot.
customer_reviews.author: Jannine

customer_reviews.title: My first digital camera, and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I read many of the reviews on different cameras before deciding on this one, and I haven't been disappointed! The pictures are beautiful, and menu is easy to navigate. There are so many different features, but the best one is ASCN, which figures out which kind of picture you want to take (lighting, background, people are all taken into account automatically! Great for a person like me who has never owned a camera and needs to learn. The only problem I have with this camera is the delay between pushing the button and the actual taking of the picture. A few of the reviews mention this, so I know I'm not the only one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hester

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and features for the money
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't believe me if I write a good reccomendation about this camera. Just buy it and try it yourself. I Have had a Canon S line before, but the price of this article for the features you've gotten is ridiculous. The Image Quality is average compared to panasonic or Canon, but believe me, you don't need anything more expensive to enjoy photography. This is a Swiss army Camera for the half even the third of the price of a similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Homersky

customer_reviews.title: Great litle camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Not many things to say about it. I'm sure there are much better, sharper cameras out there but this is a nice little first "real " camera" beyond our usual point and shoot purchases. GE is not listed on the Consumer reports but i found I like this one any ways.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why it go so many high ratings....
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing is the price. Not sure why reviews were so good on this site. Other sites have more accurate reviews. It is slow and the pictures come out blurry unless you have the flash on at all times and even then they are often blurry. Not worth buying if you want nice pictures.
customer_reviews.author: K Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera..it takes great pictures..my only issue is the "media impressions" software for editing photos that came with it, if you dont use the "auto enhance" button to adjust contrast and lighting and try to manually do it yourself, the picture looks great on the screen, but when you have them printed, it creates black splotches all over the photo, so be aware. Otherwise, this camera does everything i wanted and was a great deal, i would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: This camera is nice but I could not see through the view hold as though it was blocked on one end, don't quiet understand that though. The flash works good. but the pictures are not very clear from far. Strange as my smaller camera takes better pics.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This was better than I could hope for. Easy to operate. A little thick for small hands but it works like a charm. The flash was the one thing I found that works best with all indoor pictures. I recommend you try and see if your not has happy with it as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J.

customer_reviews.title: It's not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have owned similar cameras from Fuji Film before that have the same housing. This one seemed cheaper and did not have as many options. I ended up selling it and bought another Fuji Film. Just not the camera for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Hummel

customer_reviews.title: great digital camera
customer_reviews.text: You will not go wrong if you buy this camera because its cheap than any high end cannon camera with lots of feature & it has 15x optical zoom with audio video recording. I would recommend this to anyone because I'm satisfied with the performance of this cheap camera.
customer_reviews.author: aldwin

customer_reviews.title: GE Power Pro X500
customer_reviews.text: To this point, I have not really put the camera to a test. It does not seem to focus as clearly as my wife's Canon DSLR does nor produce the color saturation I would like. However, I did not expect a $128 camera to match up all that well. I will use it mainly to record job site activities and it should do that well. It is much easier to use than the DSLR is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of different cameras over the years and think this is by far the hardest to use. The settings are not intuitive and I get as many blurry pictures as clear ones. I cannot take a decent motion picture no matter what settings I try. I also don't like the video on the camera. The sound is not good and you cannot quickly transition from pictures to video. If I had to do it over I would NOT buy this camera.
customer_reviews.author: NLSC

customer_reviews.title: Not for any near professional useage
customer_reviews.text: bought this to be used as a back up camera, however this camera lacks stability and the zoom is very poor. I gave my son it and he now uses it as his back up, back up camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jarwrat

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little afraid of buying this camera because I have never heard of GE making a camera and the price seemed to good to be true, but after reading other reviews on Amazon I decided to go ahead and purchase it. I can not say enough good things about this camera! The pictures are awesome! I brag about it to everyone and spread the word about the price and where to find it...Amazon.com ROCKS! Seriously, I love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Dawne H

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my birthday and it was really a nice surprise. Very clear pictures and ease of use is awesome. Light weight and easy to handle, this is a sweet camera and if you are a beginner or pro, this is something you might want to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Bosarge

customer_reviews.title: GE Power Pro
customer_reviews.text: Very good little camera for the price. Has some noise issues but it is small, powerful and works for me in a lot of pro-studio situations shooting people. I use it quite a bit instead of my main very expensive camera.
customer_reviews.author: thelook1

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this for a vacation, pictures are very clear and all the feature it has makes professional quaility photos for a resonably priced camera, really pleased with zoom clarity!
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: My last camera was an Olympus and it was very good until my son dropped it. That was 3 yrs. ago. When I saw this deal with the camera, especially a GE brand I was skeptical (GE making cameras??!!!!). Anyway after checking out the specs I was convinced that it could be a good camera. I was not disappointed. The pictures are clear and the function of the camera is easy. Some camers give a blur when the zoom is used, but this one is just wonderful. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cher T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera For Unbeatable Price
customer_reviews.text: I JUST PURCHASED THIS CAMERA. WHEN I GOT IT THE PACKAGE WAS BRAND NEW.I OPENED IT THE CAMERA WAS PACKED VERY GENTLY AND CAREFULLY BY THE MANUFACTURER NO SCRATCH OR EVEN DIRT. COMES WITH CORD TO CONNECT WITH PC, LENS ARE VERY CLEAR, ALSO COMES WITH BATTERY. ( SD CARD YOU HAVE TO PURCHASE SEPARATE ) ANYWAY WHEN I TOOK MY FIRST PIC IT CAME OUT AWESOME. 16 MP CAMERA BUT TAKES PIC LIKE A REAL PRO. AUTOMATICALLY FIX THE SETTINGS AND COLOR AND BACKGROUND. I AM VERY SATISFIED WITH THIS CAMERA AND WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANYONE WHO IS LOOKING TO BUY THIS CAMERA IN FUTURE.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Das

customer_reviews.title: I'm not impressed thus far
customer_reviews.text: I have an OLD Nikon 5mp which takes clearer pics. I have a hard time getting any good shots with the GE. I photograph my 6 children 2x's a year. Then menu is a jumbled nightmare and I'm a huge tech geek. If your subject has days to get one good pic then this cam is for you. The battery life is good on reg duracells. the lens cover pops off when lens extends. I'm trying to mention good things. I think my kids will enjoy playing with this one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love it but don't use it much like I should, especially since cell phones take such great pics now. Would recommend though for anyone wanting a camera
customer_reviews.author: kyranew

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The camera is to bulky for me. Worked great for the price but it did break down after a year or so and I replaced it with a pocket Nikon which was a much better unit and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R. Benford

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing, it does so much, as in red eye, focus, and many other features. The price was perfect for my budget, the photos itself comes out so clear...I plan on ordering another one for a gift..thank you
customer_reviews.author: denise switzer

customer_reviews.title: GE Power Pro X500 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have taken several pictures and this digital cameral is absolutely great for the price. I am very satified and will probably buy other products related to GE from your company.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Owens

customer_reviews.title: Just saying, WOW WHAT A CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: If you are familiar with Fugi S series, this is pretty much a replica without the huge price tag. I am totally in love. No, it is not a SRL so don't purchase thinking it will compensate. This camera is pretty much fool proof on auto scene select. I just can't believe it. Beautiful clean pictures for the fraction of a big costly set up.
customer_reviews.author: misty e

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pics. Complicated instructions eats batteries should have a plug in power source.
customer_reviews.author: Slayr

customer_reviews.title: GE Digital CameraWorks great,
customer_reviews.text: Took it on vacation to Macinack Island. Spectacular pictures of all we took Poster picture quality of the Falls in Canada. The key is to practice the features and get them down pat.
customer_reviews.author: tonythecarver

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional photog at all, but this has come in handy for so many events where I need nice pictures. I am still learning to use all of the features, but I am happy, overall, with the images that I have been able to get.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Land

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Some doohickey in the camera broke about 6 months after owning it. You can still use it, but it doesn't work at 100 percent and who wants to go get it fixed when it wasn't that expensive. Camera was very plasticy.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: GE cuts through the chase
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera just based on its solid, heavy build. I have come to realize GE is the company that simplifies even complex functions for the consumer and prices its product with the consumer in mind. Took a few pictures, loved it. All indoors. I have decided to read the manual bcos i believe this camera is worth reading a manual for. I normally dont read manuals.
customer_reviews.author: J. Teye-kofi

customer_reviews.title: Great Prodcut
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was expecting, great that it takes AA batteries and not a charging pack easy to use on the go. You will not get studio quality pictures but they will be great quality and the size is right and the price is right and the camera is all around right. Don't wait get yours!
customer_reviews.author: Pepperclan

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: A really nice point and shoot. Has more features than the average Joe will ever need, plus the zoom is fantastic. I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she LOVED it. Several of our friends have the super expensive DSLR cameras and they usually get jealous of hers, because it is so lightweight and simple to use. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darren W. Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good little camera that does almost anything you would want. Easy to figure out. gave it to my son who has a photography class. His teacher was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wehnes

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.text: The camera is exactly what you pay for. The panorama feature is pretty cool. I'm not sure if I got a defective product, or if it just drains batteries like crazy, but I got exhausted battery warnings after less than 20 photos. I'd open the case and adjust the batteries, turn it on, and it would say full battery. Not sure. I'm going to buy a couple sets of rechargeable batteries. The last thing I need is to take a picture and camera won't turn on. We'll see! In the mean time, saving up for a dslr..
customer_reviews.author: Lookitsashhole

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: i recieved this camera right before christmas 2011. it is wonderful. i took a bunch of pictures. not a professional with picture taking but other than me not holding my hand steady i had no problems, yet.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very comfortable to hold and an excellent choice for someone learning to use a digital SLR style. I like that it has the view finder and what I was looking for taking photos outdoors in the sun. However, surprisingly, I am not finding that I need too often, because the lcd screen is easy to use too. It has very good zooming, but one draw back so far is the ability to perform very close focusing so you have to play with it for close shots. Overall, very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Camera review
customer_reviews.text: I looked for days online to find a replacement for my 6MP camera,and I have another expensive SLR. This is one of the best deals on a bridge camera that takes beautiful clear and vibrant colored pictures. Great camera,great price,great pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE !!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The camera we received has a defective cable connector, and we cannot download the pictures in the camera. Because the camera did not come with a computer cable, we did not discover this problem until after we bought an X500 computer cable, and found that the connector in the camera is defective, making the camera worthless!
customer_reviews.author: PF

product_meta.title: GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, Black (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackGE X500 Power Pro Series Bridge Camera with Electronic View Finder, Optical Image Stabilization, 16MP, 15X Optical Zoom, 2.7"LCD, 27mm Wide Angle Lens and advanced features including Shutter & Aperture Priority mode, Program mode, ASCN, Pan-Capture Panorama, Smile & Blink Detection, Face Detection, Face Auto Exposure, Red-Eye Removal, High Dynamic Range. Power by AA Battery.What's in the box: General Electric X500 Bridge Digital Camera – Black, 4x AA Alkaline Batteries, USB Cable, Shoulder Strap, CD-ROM Manual, Quick Start Guide, Feature Guide and One Year Limited. Warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



If you want it all, you'll want one of the GE Pro series of bridge cameras. The new X500 is as powerful as it is easy to use. All the latest digital camera technology is seamlessly built in to reflect your own powerful sense of style and capture those priceless memories that define our lives. Get closer to the action and take photos like a pro with the X500 from GE's Pro line of digital cameras.



16 MEGAPIXELS WITH 15X OPTICAL ZOOM
The X500's 16 MP lens means your images will be alive with detail, capturing every nuance. A 15x optical zoom (combined with a 6x digital zoom) lets you get close to the action without needing to get right in the middle of it. A vivid 2.7-inch LCD screen with Auto Adjust Brightness lets you frame every shot with ease, letting you see exactly what you're getting with each click.



As powerful as it is easy to use


All the latest digital camera technology is seamlessly built in

ELECTRONIC VIEW FINDER
In addition to the 2.7-inch LCD screen, the X500 has an electronic view finder for more accurate shots in real time and better scene composition.

SHOOT VIDEO WITH EASE
Capture all of your videos with ease. The X500 takes MPEG-4 videos in .MOV format with G.711 monaural audio for simple, one-touch recording of those special moments. And they're easy to share using a USB connection or SD card reader.

HIGH DYNAMIC RANGE (HDR) ADJUSTMENT
An in-camera HDR feature adjusts exposure for more detail in light and dark scenes. Get the right balance of detail no matter the lighting conditions. A 3200 ISO improves pictures in low lighting condition for optimal exposure.

OPTICAL IMAGE STABILIZATION WITH AUTO SCENE
Correct unintentional camera movements with automatic image stabilization, giving you crisp, clear photos. The Auto Scene feature automatically selects and sets the correct scene type for the sharpest, most vibrant pictures possible.

FACE AUTO EXPOSURE AND SMILE DETECTION
Face Auto Exposure enhances facial features detected by the camera for true subject highlighting, making your friends and family jump out of your photos. Smile Detection lets you capture the right moment by allowing the shutter to automatically release when the subject’s smile appears.

AUTOMATIC BRIGHTNESS ADJUSTMENT
An in-camera auto-brightness feature adjusts the camera's LCD viewing screen for more detail in light and dark scenes. Get the right balance of detail no matter the lighting conditions.

AA BATTERIES
Convenient, easy and no-hassle AA batteries keep you on the go. Get 300 shots from regular AA alkaline batteries, or up to 500 shots from AA NiMH batteries.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
GE X500 digital camera, 4xAA alkaline batteries, USB cable, shoulder strap, CD-ROM, manual, Quick Start Guide, Feature Guides, warranty card.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Effective Image Sensor Pixels: 16 Megapixel
 * Anti-Shake: Optical Image Stabilization
 * Zoom: 15x Optical, 6x Digital
 * ISO Sensitivity: Auto, ISO 80 / 100 / 200 / 400 / 800 / 1600/ 3200
 * Recording: 640×480 pixels: 30 fps / 15 fps, 320×240 pixels: 30 fps / 15 fps
 * Still Image: 16MP: 4608×3456, (16:9) 12MP: 4640×2608, 8MP: 3264×2448, 5MP: 2592×1944, 3MP: 2048×1536, 0.3MP: 640×480
 * Image Compression: Best, Fine, Normal
 * Movie Format: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264(MOV)
 * Audio Format: G.711 Monaural
 * Still Image Format: Exif 2.2 (JPEG)
 * Detection Features: Face Detection, Smile Detection, Blink Detection
 * High Dynamic Range: Yes
 * Internal Flash: Auto, Red-Eye Reduction, Forced Flash, No Flash, Slow Synchro, Red-Eye Reduction + Slow Synchro
 * Battery: AA alkaline or NiMH
 * Dimensions (W x H x D): 4.06" × 2.92" × 2.68"
 * Weight: 12.3oz
feature_bullets: 16 MP Digital Camera with 15X Optical Zoom
Built-in 14MB internal memory with SD/SDHC support up to 16GB
Optical image stabilization, face auto exposure, auto scene, and 3200 ISO

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars549 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
